body_html: @rryan, I have working CPU/GPU kernels for complex FFTs based on Eigen but have some issues integrating your recent RFFT changes. Would you be up for a chat to iron out those bumps so we can add the CPU kernels? Ideally, I would like to move to an interface similar to conv2d which takes use_cudnn_on_gpu as an optional argument.
body_text: @rryan, I have working CPU/GPU kernels for complex FFTs based on Eigen but have some issues integrating your recent RFFT changes. Would you be up for a chat to iron out those bumps so we can add the CPU kernels? Ideally, I would like to move to an interface similar to conv2d which takes use_cudnn_on_gpu as an optional argument.
body: @rryan, I have working CPU/GPU kernels for complex FFTs based on Eigen but have some issues integrating your recent RFFT changes. Would you be up for a chat to iron out those bumps so we can add the CPU kernels? Ideally, I would like to move to an interface similar to `conv2d` which takes `use_cudnn_on_gpu` as an optional argument.
